about_the_game:
Tunnel Warfare is a role-playing shooter game set during World War II, based on historical and cinematic references, the enemy invaded our home, burning, looting and doing nothing.
The survival of the people entered a difficult stage, and the "moppup" plan launched by the enemy became increasingly cruel. In order to preserve their strength, the people's resistance armed forces carried out a travel war for a long time, and began to dig and use tunnels to fight against the enemy.
Players need to dig hidden holes in their own homes, but will soon be found and destroyed by the enemy, players need to design more hidden, easier to pass the tunnel, used to avoid the enemy's search, you can also use the tunnel to attack the enemy.
 The player takes the role
The player operates the character, finds the appropriate tunnel entrance in the village to mark, and the villagers will dig according to the tunnel set by the player
The player can arrange to build defensive measures including: tunnels, shooting holes, forts, roof shooting structures, traps, mines, etc
Players are free to move around the map to find and kill enemies
The player can sneak into the enemy camp to rescue the villagers and expand their strength
 enemies
The enemy will be in the game time, from time to time to sweep, the enemy from the camp to the village, sweep behavior, will destroy the village buildings, rob the player's supplies
The player must resist the enemy's sweep to prevent the enemy from capturing the villagers.
The main line of the game: While defending against enemy attacks, collect enemy dropped materials, and break down and make new weapons, and use the obtained weapons to counter, and remove all the enemy camps, the game victory.
In-game weapons:
Homemade native guns, broadswords, spears, rifles, mines, grenades, light machine guns, heavy machine guns, breaking guns, cannons, etc
At present, the game is in the process of production, and the demo is planned to be released around October this year.
QQ: 387012395
detailed_description:
Tunnel Warfare is a role-playing shooter game set during World War II, based on historical and cinematic references, the enemy invaded our home, burning, looting and doing nothing.
The survival of the people entered a difficult stage, and the "moppup" plan launched by the enemy became increasingly cruel. In order to preserve their strength, the people's resistance armed forces carried out a travel war for a long time, and began to dig and use tunnels to fight against the enemy.
Players need to dig hidden holes in their own homes, but will soon be found and destroyed by the enemy, players need to design more hidden, easier to pass the tunnel, used to avoid the enemy's search, you can also use the tunnel to attack the enemy.
 The player takes the role
The player operates the character, finds the appropriate tunnel entrance in the village to mark, and the villagers will dig according to the tunnel set by the player
The player can arrange to build defensive measures including: tunnels, shooting holes, forts, roof shooting structures, traps, mines, etc
Players are free to move around the map to find and kill enemies
The player can sneak into the enemy camp to rescue the villagers and expand their strength
 enemies
The enemy will be in the game time, from time to time to sweep, the enemy from the camp to the village, sweep behavior, will destroy the village buildings, rob the player's supplies
The player must resist the enemy's sweep to prevent the enemy from capturing the villagers.
The main line of the game: While defending against enemy attacks, collect enemy dropped materials, and break down and make new weapons, and use the obtained weapons to counter, and remove all the enemy camps, the game victory.
In-game weapons:
Homemade native guns, broadswords, spears, rifles, mines, grenades, light machine guns, heavy machine guns, breaking guns, cannons, etc
At present, the game is in the process of production, and the demo is planned to be released around October this year.

name: The Tunnel Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

publishers: Henan Moshaofu Software Technology Co., Ltd
short_description: "Tunnel War" is a role-playing pixel war themed game, the game based on the history and the movie "Tunnel War" in the simple peasant door in order to defend their homes against invaders, players need to unite all effective forces to build defensive measures, the enemy to resist outside the village.
